metadata.title: Mohsin Naqvi condemns firing attack on Warsak Road Peshawar

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 05 (APP):Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi Wednesday condemned the firing attack on Warsak Road Peshawar. He paid rich tribute to Inspector Shahid Anwar who was martyred in the firing attack. He expressed his heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family and said that Inspector Shahid Anwar achieved the highest rank of martyrdom while performing his duties. "I salute the Ultima sacrifice of Inspector Shahid Anwar," he said. The minister further said that we equally share the grief of the martyr's family.
